column6: passed away peacefully on tuesday june 9
column8: at the mountain ridge center in franklin. born on april 21
column10: the son of thomas and veronica (ogara) clark
column11: william was a navy veteran and worked many years as a steelworker in boston. william would often be seen taking daily walks all over his adopted city of portsmouth
column12: and in past years he rode his bicycle
column13: enjoying the outdoors. william is survived by his brother robert clark and his wife margaret of washington
column15: and many nieces and nephews. he was pre-deceased by brothers thomas
column20: and sisters mary clark and alice fuller. private burial will be at the nh veterans cemetery. in lieu of flowers
column21: donations in williams memory can be made to portsmouth new hampshire salvation army
